info.title: Application Loader
info.description: Responsible for loading safely application views.

method.name: load
method.description: Loads and executes a given application view.

parameter.name: $viewName
parameter.description: The application view name. If empty, get the default/startup application view name. It is empty by default.

method.name: getAppResources
method.description: Get all the loading application related resources.

parameter.name: $appID
parameter.description: The application id to get the resources for.

method.returndescription: An array of resource id as key and as value an array of resource css and js data.

method.name: getAppViewRsrcArray
method.description: Get the given application's resource array including all the app views.
method.returndescription: An array of resources by id. The array has a key of the resource id and a value of the resource attributes. For testers, it includes as extra information the application id and the view.
